page.title: 03Farming in Ringstead.
page.content: A class of 29 7-9 year old children sent a questionaire to the farmers in Ringstead.The following statistics are the result of their survey. SLADE FARM:-Size:-260 acres.Crops:-oil- seed rape,wheat.No live-stock.1 worker. RINGSTEAD GRANGE FARM:-Size:-565 acres. 120 cows,50 goslings.Crops:-barley,oil- seed rape,wheat.4 workers employed. NORTH FARM:-Size:-42 acres.No live stock.Farmed by owner. RINGSTEAD FARM:-Size:-150 acres.50 cows Crops:-wheat,barley,grass for fodder. 1 worker employed. HOME FARM:-Size:-265 acres.Cows and cattle.Crops:-wheat,barley,grass for silage and grazing.1 worker employed. TITHE FARM:-Size:-35 acres.2800 pigs reared. RIDING STABLES:-Size:-3.5 acres.32 horses kept.4 workers employed.
